verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* said \w to|strong="H3559"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, “\w Build|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* rams.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w had|strong="H1109"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram \w on|strong="H5927"\w* each \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

“Stay \w here|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*,” \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*. “Perhaps \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* reveals \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* barren height,

\w and|strong="H4196"\w* God \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w with|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*. “I \w have|strong="H6499"\w* \w set|strong="H6186"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*,” \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* said, “\w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* each \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* I \w have|strong="H6499"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*’s \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Balak, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H5375"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* oracle, saying: “\w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Aram, \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*. ‘\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*,’ \w he|strong="H4480"\w* said, ‘\w put|strong="H5148"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w denounce|strong="H2194"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!’

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cursed|strong="H6895"\w*? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w denounce|strong="H2194"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w denounced|strong="H2194"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* atop \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w rocky|strong="H6697"\w* cliffs, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w watch|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H7931"\w* apart, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* reckoning \w themselves|strong="H7218"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w count|strong="H4487"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w or|strong="H4194"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* even \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7255"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w*; \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* end \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* theirs!”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*? \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H3947"\w* only \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H6030"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* exactly \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?” Balaam’s Second Oracle

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, “Please \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w outskirts|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* camp—\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Balak \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Zophim|strong="H6839"\w*, \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w*, \w where|strong="H1129"\w* \w he|strong="H3947"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

Balaam said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, “Stay \w here|strong="H3541"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w while|strong="H3541"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w meet|strong="H7136"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H3541"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* returned \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*?” \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H5375"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* oracle, saying: “\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*; \w give|strong="H5375"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*.

\w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w change|strong="H5162"\w* \w His|strong="H6965"\w* \w mind|strong="H5162"\w*. \w Does|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Does|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w promise|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w*?

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* command \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w change|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w considers|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* disaster \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

God \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w strength|strong="H8443"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H7214"\w* \w ox|strong="H7214"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w spell|strong="H5173"\w* \w against|strong="H7081"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* \w against|strong="H7081"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* said \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* great \w things|strong="H6256"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w*!’

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w rouse|strong="H6965"\w* themselves \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lion|strong="H3833"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* resting \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* devour \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H1571"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* said \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, “\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H1288"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H1288"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Did|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?”

“\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w*,” said \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* another \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. Perhaps \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* God \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w*, \w which|strong="H6465"\w* \w overlooks|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wasteland|strong="H3452"\w*.\f + \fr 23:28 \ft Or Jeshimon\f*

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* said, “\w Build|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* rams.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w had|strong="H1109"\w* instructed, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram \w on|strong="H5927"\w* each \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
